price: ហើយពួកគេទទួលបានផលប្រយោជន៍ និងទឹកដោះជា ច្រើនពីពួកវា។ ដូចេ្នះ តើពួកគេមិនដឹងគុណទេឬ?
arabic: وَلَهُمۡ فِيهَا مَنَٰفِعُ وَمَشَارِبُۚ أَفَلَا يَشۡكُرُونَ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: walahum fīhā manāfiʿu wamashāribu afalā yashkurūna
